subject: Implementation of Hybrid ETC System (HES) in all lanes of Toll / User Fee Plazas along the National Highways-Standard Operating Procedure for management of monthly passes through FASTag-reg.
text: HKaiy 7riy <THTif mfearrut 3974 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (88s QRaet &1 <TATf 4na4) 5a7 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 3i-5 & 6, #aer-10 ara , T fari-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Management of Monthly Passes/2o18 Policy No.17.5.78, Dated the 16th February 2018 (Decision taken by EC in the meeting dated 31.01.2018 on the Agenda no.333.04) Sub: Implementation of Hybrid ETC System (HES) in all lanes of Toll User Fee Plazas along the National Highways-Standard Operating Procedure for  management of monthly passes through FASTag-reg: Reference: Letter No. ETC/Operations/Phase-I12017/304 dated 20th July 2017 ii Circular No. NHAI/13013/2016-17/CO/Hybrid ETC dated 30th November, 2017 1 In order to remove the bottlenecks associated with manual toll collection and ensure seamless movement of traffic and collection of toll as per the notified rates, the Government: had decided to introduce Electronic Toll Collection (ETC) across National Highways in India: Additionally , it was mandated to install; maintain and operate a uniform; inter-operable Hybrid ETC System on all lanes of all the toll plazas of the country 2_ Vide Ref= (i) and: (ii), the decision of  the Government to  implement: Hybrid : ETC System on PPP toll plazas was conveyed and the SOP and timelines for the same had been communicated? 3_ Currently, monthly passes, wherever applicable, are being issued on multiple modes of payment including cash and FASTag: But o ground; it has been observed that majority of monthly passes are being issued and processed through cash lanes only leading to severe congestion at the toll plazas. 4. Hence _ in order to ensure effective decongestion at toll plazas and promote FASTag, it has been decided that all monthly passes, wherever applicable, shall be issued mandatorily by concessionaires toli plaza operators through FASTag only starting from April 2018, All subsequent processing and renewal of monthly passes shall be done o ETC platform through FASTags and no cash payment shall be accepted for the same This shall be applicable at all the toll plazas where at least one lane in each direction of traffic is Hybrid ETC enabled 5 Toll plaza operators concessionaires shall conduct regular awareness program prior to implementation of the above mentioned management of monthly passes through to communicate the changes to the road users and to ensure all monthly pass users have FASTags for subsequent payment of user fees. 6_ This issues with the approval of competent Authority of NHAI: (V.K Sharma) Chief General Manager(HR/Admn:)-| To All Officers at NHAI HQ/ROs/PIUS/CMUs/Site Offices.
